function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Loss of confidence in collective forms of transport","Impact":"Significant budget and image troubles for cities","Mitigation":"Implement measures to ensure passengers feel safe using public transport","Technologies":"Sanitization technologies, crowd management systems, digital health platforms","People":"Passengers using public transport","Owner":"City authorities"},{"Description":"Low return rate of people who completely gave up public transport","Impact":"Decreased mobility options and potential strain on alternative transport resources","Mitigation":"Conduct in-depth research on the needs of the local community to address concerns and provide incentives for returning to public transport","Technologies":"Surveys, data analytics, targeted communication platforms","People":"Local community, former public transport users","Owner":"Transport authorities"}]}
